Needless to say, like Top Gear Season 9 episode 1 (it was requested to be removed since Hammond had a terrible wreck and asked not to rebroadcast it), season 3 most likely will never be an american copy (of course except for bootlegs).

More and more is revealed about Belle's type of man, and it is not always pretty. Billie Piper manages to show us the hardened soul that is required to do this work, and yet still remain soft, human, and have appropriate responses to truly odd and inappropriate behavior. The circumstances and scenarios her clients come up with become more and more absurd, but I really enjoyed it. It wasn't easy to find, and the format is different, but my MAC figured it out!

WTF Showtime!  Season 3 was the best season of this show.  It really shows the duality of the character.  Please release it!  Billie Piper was brilliant in this role.  She was confident yet vulnerable and I donlt think anyone could have played it quite the same way.

Fortunately for me I have a multi-region dvd player so I was able to watch this box set. It shows great and in full as it originally aired on Showtime. It had been so long since I'd been able to watch season three (it's no longer on demand) it was like watching it for the first time.

This is my favorite season of this show. I guess the US will never be releasing season three on dvd...But if you have a multi-region dvd player it's safe to buy this dvd.

I loved this show and I'm so happy that I own and can watch the complete series.

It is a shame that they do not have this in a format that can be seen on American DVD players.
But here is what I did and you can do it too.
Buy the Region 2 DVDs. Then use your PC or Mac to RIP those DVDs.
You can save them to a hard drive and watch them, or burn them to DVDs that can be used in American DVD players.

Firstly, for those who are frustrated that seasons 1, 2, and 4 are available on Amazon but not 3, at the moment you can find season 3 out there online to stream, just not with as high a quality of picture. I got it at watch-tvseries.net. As I watch most shows I like more than once, I do hope Amazon gets it together, handles whatever licensing issues are a problem, and delivers it in the future, because it doesn't make any sense to have one whole season missing. At least it's out there somewhere, though, which means you can catch up and then come back to Amazon for season 4. As for an actual review of the show, the third season is absolutely fabulous, getting much deeper into how Hannah/Belle has to juggle the roles she plays, with it getting clearer and clearer something has to come crashing down no matter how hard she tries to keep it all going. Yet it does that without getting too dark or compromising the humor of the show, and those who put it together did so artfully. Most of the lighter moments come from encounters with clients, but even in those we see cracks forming in Belle's world that reach into Hannah's. Keeping her profession and the secrets that come with it to herself increases the pressure on her relationships and lifestyle, affecting her ability to function within the confines her double life creates. Still, for pure entertainment value, it's hard to beat Billie Piper/Belle wallowing around on a giant cupcake with a client into sploshing! Also, when she ran into Stephanie at a fetish club and had their big confrontational moment, the former madam was spread eagle in restraints and about to be...well, let's not give away too much information. The point is that this season offers plenty of fun and fantasy but still has an emotional depth that is the beating heart of the show. So, wherever you can get it, it's definitely worth it!
